events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but I would like to request a refund as the item does not fit me properly.
Automatically categorizing the incoming customer message as a Refund request based on keywords.
Assigning the refund request case to a customer support agent experienced in handling refund transactions.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund for your recent purchase. How can I assist you further?
Could you please provide your order number and let us know if the item was used or damaged, so we can process your refund correctly?
Thanks for your response. The order number is 123456789, and the jacket is brand new with tags still attached; I havenâ€™t worn it yet.
We can initiate the refund process right away. Please mail the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will send you shortly.
That sounds great, thanks! I appreciate the quick help and clear instructions about the refund process.
The return label has been emailed to you, and your refund will be processed once we receive the item back. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just checking in to see if you received the return label and if the refund process is going smoothly for your jacket.
We have received your returned jacket and completed your refund. We are now closing this case. Thank you for shopping with us.
